member.name: T:PMPE.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:PMPE.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:PMPE.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:PMPE.My.Resources.Resources.AbandonGame
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Abandon the game?.

member.name: P:PMPE.My.Resources.Resources.AboutNotice
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to The first version of this game was created in 2010 with Visual Studio 2005.
This version is a full refactor of the first, done in 2022 with Visual Studio 2022.
The sounds are free to use for non-commercial applications.
Pictionary and Pictionary Mania! are trademarks of Mattel, Inc. This program was created as a programming exercise and it does not reproduce the original game's full mechanics. I don't make any money out of it and it can't be sold.
The background image is based on a picture o [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:PMPE.My.Resources.Resources.ConfirmReload
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Starting a new game will reload all databases, and any words that have already appeared may do so again.
Continue?.

member.name: P:PMPE.My.Resources.Resources.LastWordWarning
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to This word is last one left! Once you're done, press "New game" to start over if you wish..

member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: P:PMPE.My.Resources.Resources.MissingDatabaseAll
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No database is available, so the game can't be played. Either restore a backup of the databases or reinstall the application to solve the problem..

member.name: P:PMPE.My.Resources.Resources.MissingDatabaseSome
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Corresponding categories aren't playable and have been disabled. Remaining categories can still be played. Either restore a backup of the databases or reinstall the application to solve the problem..

member.name: P:PMPE.My.Resources.Resources.MissingDatabaseStub
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to The following databases are missing or unaccessible:
.
